name: UNSTABLE (Inoi)
description:
Made For Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

by SOMOV KIRILL

Manual Control, RMB to enter (LMB - shoot, Keyboard - moving, press different buttons in colored zone to increase movement in defined (yellow) direction).

For example, left movement isolated and you need to move left: hold RMB and smash left side buttons (left up and left down zones) as fast as true programmers code with the speed of light :D

Then release RMB to move up, down, right via WSD buttons.

! CHECK SCREENSHOTS FOR INPUT LAYOUT !

Models & Textures by Ebal Studios, Chadderbox, kawetofe, VIS Games, Zakhan

Music by tricksntraps

SFX by Little Robot Sound Factory

www.littlerobotsoundfactory.com

Created by

SOMOV KIRILL
